author: "Acosta, Cristbal, approximately 1515-approximately 1592"
title: "Aromatum et medicamentorum in Orientali India nascentium liber: plurimum lucis adferens iis quae a Doctore Garcia de Orta ... scripta sunt / Christophori a Costa ; Caroli Clusii ... opera ex Hispanico sermone latinus factus, in epitomen contractus, et qui"
